Class ContactsApp

java.lang.Object
ContactsApp
public class ContactsApp extends Object
A simple contacts manager aplication. You can add, edit, view and delete contacts This aplicatipn doesn't have graphical user interface. Instead it is made for command line user interface.

      The main methos, which starts the COntactsApp.
      Parameters:
      args - Command line argument.

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the app and displays a menu for user actions. It loads contacts and then provides a console interface for user input.

    • loadContact

      public void loadContact()
      Loads contact's from the csv file into the contacts list.

    • findPersonById

      public personInfo findPersonById(String id)
      Finds person by theis ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the person to find.
      Returns:
      personInfo if there is somebody by that ID. Otherwise null.
